casebody.data:
CAROLINA MARLIN CLUB MARINA ASSOCIATION, INC. d/b/a Morehead-Beaufort Yacht Club
v.
Harry PREDDY and Valerie Freddy. No. 46P15. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Aug. 20, 2015. Amie Huber, Morehead City, for Preddy, Harry, et al. C.R. Wheatly, III, for Carolina Marlin Club Marina Association, Inc., et al.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the conditional petition filed on the 13th of February 2015 by Plaintiff in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 20th of August 2015."
